        }
        
        .layout-sidebar_enabled .layout-sidebar_sidebar {
            bottom: 0;
            height: 100%;
            position: fixed;
            right: 0;
            transition: var( --reduced-motion, all var(--layout-sidebar-duration) var(--layout-sidebar-function));
            width: 0;
            width: var(--layout-sidebar-width, 0);
            z-index: var(--layout-sidebar-zindex)
        }
        
        @media (max-width:699.98px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled .layout-sidebar_sidebar {
                height: 0;
                width: 100%
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width:700px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded {
                --layout-content-width: 50%;
                --layout-sidebar-width: 50%
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width:992px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded {
                --layout-content-width: 60%;
                --layout-sidebar-width: 40%
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width:1200px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded {
                --layout-content-width: 66.666%;
                --layout-sidebar-width: 33.333%
            }
        }
        
        @media (max-width:699.98px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded .layout-sidebar_sidebar {
                height: 100%
            }
        }
        
        @media (max-width:699.98px) {
            html:where(:not(.has-cq)) .up-smf {
                margin-top: calc(var(--ws-4x)*-1)
            }
        }
        
        @container (max-width: 699.98px) {
            html:where(.has-cq) .up-smf {
                margin-top: calc(var(--ws-4x)*-1)
            }
        }
        
        .up-smf-very-top .up-alert {
            margin-left: 0;
            margin-right: 0
        }
        
        #__layout,
        #__nuxt {
            height: 100%
        }
        
        :root {
            --nc-user-nav-height: var(--ma-u-nav-height, 64px)
        }
        
        @media (max-width:991.98px) {
            :root {
                --nc-user-nav-height: var(--ma-u-nav-height, 56px)
            }
        }
        
        .air3-smf-container .air3-alert-inline {
            margin-bottom: var(--ws-8x)
        }

        }

                                    :root {
                                        --nav-height: 64px;
                                        --unscoped-body-bg: var(--bg-body)
                                    }
                                    
                                    @media (max-width:991.98px) {
                                        :root {
                                            --nav-height: 56px
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    @container (max-width: 991.98px) {
                                        .layout {
                                            --nav-height: 56px
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ngm-layout-container .nav-v2 {
                                        --nav-shadow: 0 1px 0 0 var(--border-color)
                                    }
                                    
                                    html:has(.nav-is-open, .nav-search-is-open) {
                                        scrollbar-gutter: stable
                                    }
                                    
                                    @media (max-width:991.98px) {
                                        html:has(.nav-is-open, .nav-search-is-open) {
                                            scrollbar-gutter: unset
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    html:has(.nav-is-open, .nav-search-is-open) .nav-parent-wrapper {
                                        max-width: 991.98px
                                    }
                                    
                                    html:has(.nav-is-open, .nav-search-is-open) .layout,
                                    html:has(.nav-is-open, .nav-search-is-open) .layout-container {
                                        container-type: inline-size
                                    }
                                    
                                    @container (max-width: 991.98px) {
                                        :scope body.nav-is-open .layout>:not(.nav-v2, .nav-parent-wrapper),
                                        :scope body.nav-is-open .up-alert,
                                        :scope body.nav-is-open footer,
                                        :scope body.nav-search-is-open .layout>:not(.nav-v2, .nav-parent-wrapper),
                                        :scope body.nav-search-is-open .up-alert,
                                        :scope body.nav-search-is-open footer {
                                            display: none
                                        }
                                        :scope body.nav-is-open {
                                            overflow: visible!important
                                        }
                                        :scope body.nav-is-open .nav-container {
                                            overflow: auto;
                                            height: 100dvh
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-switch-btn {
                                        --switch-width: 29px;
                                        --switch-height: 19px;
                                        --switch-padding: 0;
                                        --switch-margin: 0;
                                        --switch-bg: var(--bg-btn-check-dark);
                                        --switch-bg-hover: var(--bg-btn-check-dark-hover);
                                        --switch-bg-selected: var(--bg-btn-check-dark-selected);
                                        --switch-bg-selected-hover: var(--bg-btn-check-dark-selected-hover);
                                        --switch-border-color: var(--border-color-btn-check-dark);
                                        --switch-border-color-hover: var(--border-color-btn-check-dark-hover);
                                        --switch-border-color-selected: var(--border-color-btn-check-dark-selected);
                                        --switch-border-color-selected-hover: var(--border-color-btn-check-dark-selected-hover);
                                        --switch-border-width: var(--border-width-btn-check-dark);
                                        --switch-border: var(--switch-border-width) solid var(--switch-border-color);
                                        --switch-radius: var(--radius-pill);
                                        --switch-icon-size: 10.5px;
                                        --switch-icon-bg: var(--text-on-btn-check-dark);
                                        --switch-icon-bg-hover: var(--text-on-btn-check-dark-hover);
                                        --switch-icon-bg-selected: var(--text-on-btn-check-dark-selected);
                                        --switch-icon-bg-selected-hover: var(--text-on-btn-check-dark-selected-hover);
                                        --switch-inverted-border-color: var(--bg-inverse);
                                        --switch-inverted-border-color-selected-hover: #0000;
                                        --switch-inverted-bg: #0000;
                                        --switch-inverted-bg-hover: var(--bg-btn-light-inverted-hover);
                                        --switch-inverted-bg-selected: var(--bg-inverse);
                                        --switch-inverted-bg-selected-hover: var(--bg-btn-dark-inverted-hover);
                                        --switch-inverted-icon-bg: var(--hc-text-on-btn, var(--bg-inverse));
                                        --switch-inverted-icon-bg-hover: var(--hc-bg-selected, var(--bg-inverse));
                                        --switch-inverted-icon-bg-selected: var(--hc-bg-selected, var(--bg-accent));
                                        position: relative;
                                        width: var(--switch-width);
                                        height: var(--switch-height);
                                        padding: var(--switch-padding);
                                        border: var(--switch-border);
                                        border-radius: var(--switch-radius);
                                        background: var(--switch-bg);
                                        margin: var(--switch-padding)
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-switch-btn:hover {
                                        --switch-border-color: var(--switch-border-color-hover);
                                        --switch-icon-bg: var(--switch-icon-bg-hover);
                                        --switch-bg: var(--switch-bg-hover)
                                    }
                                    
                                    @container (max-width: 991.98px) {
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-switch-btn {
                                            --switch-width: 48px;
                                            --switch-height: 32px;
                                            --switch-icon-size: 18px
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-switch-icon {
                                        position: absolute;

                                    .ma-scope_user#user-top-navigation-container {
                                        --nav-height: var(--ma-u-nav-height);
                                        contain: layout
                                    }
                                    
                                    #user-top-navigation-container.ma-scope_user.nav-fix-position {
                                        position: absolute;
                                        width: 100%;
                                        z-index: var(--zindex-navbar)
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 {
                                        height: var(--nav-height);
                                        min-height: auto!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 {
                                        --nav-toggle: flex;
                                        margin-bottom: var(--nav-margin);
                                        background: var(--nav-bg);
                                        color: var(--nav-text);
                                        box-shadow: var(--nav-shadow);
                                        letter-spacing: var(--nav-letter-spacing)
                                    }
                                    
                                    @media (forced-colors:active) {
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 {
                                            border-bottom: var(--border-hc)
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .up-skip-nav {
                                        padding: 14px var(--nav-ws-4x);
                                        font-size: calc(var(--font-size-base) + 1px);
                                        background: var(--nav-bg);
                                        color: var(--nav-text-accent);
                                        z-index: calc(var(--zindex-navbar-fixed) + 1)
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .up-skip-nav:focus {
                                        width: auto;
                                        height: auto;
                                        clip: auto;
                                        clip-path: none;
                                        outline-offset: -2px
                                    }
                                    
                                    @media print {
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .up-skip-nav {
                                            display: none
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-flex {
                                        display: flex!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-none {
                                        display: none!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-block {
                                        display: block!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    @container (min-width: 992px) {
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-lg-none {
                                            display: none!important
                                        }
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-lg-block {
                                            display: block!important
                                        }

                                    }

                                                        <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" data-test="job-description-line-clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper text-body break job-description" style="--lines:3;--line-clamp-expanded-height:nullpx;">
                                                            <!---->
                                                            <div id="air3-line-clamp-154804" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><span data-test="job-description-text">Were producing a broadcast television series focused on science, health, and longevity  and were looking for a talented AI-native video editor and motion graphics creator to join our post-production team on a freelance basis.

This role is ideal for someone whos fluent in generative video tools and can quickly produce visual segments that enhance storytelling. Youll be responsible for using AI platforms to generate explainers, motion graphics, and custom visuals that will be included directly in final cuts for broadcast.

Key Responsibilities:
		Use generative tools (Runway, Pika, Genmo, ElevenLabs, etc.) to create visuals, motion graphics, or B-roll elements
		Generate photos and art that can be then broken down into Photoshop layers to be animated. 
- take descriptoins from the show and create full AI sequences based on the visuals described
		Collaborate with editors and producers to integrate content seamlessly into episodes
		Engineer prompts and refine outputs for quality and consistency
		Prepare versioned or localized outputs as needed



Ideal Candidate:
		Strong portfolio or reel with examples of generative video or motion design
		Comfortable with tools like Runway, Pika, Genmo, Sora, Stable Diffusion, etc.
		Experience with editing tools like Premiere Pro, Resolve, or Final Cut
		Understands narrative pacing, polish, and tone appropriate for TV
		Self-starter who can take a brief and run with it  but also collaborate with a team



Project Details:
		Type: Freelance (Ongoing, episodic support)
		Location: Remote
		Start Date: ASAP
		Rate: $400$600/day (or per segment, negotiable based on scope & experience)
		Duration: Project-based with potential for longer-term collaboration



To apply, please submit:
	1.	A short message describing your experience with generative video tools
	2.	A portfolio or reel showcasing relevant work
	3.	Your availability and preferred rate structure

Were excited to work with someone whos passionate about the future of video and ready to help push the boundaries of storytelling with AI.</span></div>

The ideal\ncandidate thrives at the intersection of technology and visual storytelling for\nvertical narrative production.\n\n02: What Youll Do\nAI Video Generation:\n       - Utilize the latest AI-generation tools to produce high-quality content.\n       - Develop custom AI-generated elements  including scene enhancements, transitions, and visual effects  to elevate storytelling.\n       - Experiment with new AI video tools and workflows to keep our production\ncutting-edge.\n\nVideo Editing:\n        - Edit and deliver polished vertical-format (9:16) videos\n       - Combine AI-generated visuals with traditional footage for cohesive narratives.\n       - Ensure all videos meet brand aesthetics and technical quality standards.\n\nOptimization and Collaboration:\n       - Tailor edits for mobile-first audiences, ensuring maximum engagement.\n       - Maintain organized project files, versioning, and deliverables\n       - Collaborate with our production team and editors to conceptualize unique and\nengaging AI-driven video\n\n03: What Were Looking For\n- Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio\n       - Short-form, vertical content preferred\n- Expertise in AI video generation tools, such as:\n       - Runway Gen-2\u002F3\n       - Pika Labs\n       - Google Veo (Flow)\n       - Luma Labs\n       - MidJourney or other image-to-video workflows.\n       - Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro.\n- Strong understanding of 9:16 composition and mobile-first content strategies.\n- A passion for storytelling, AI technology, and creative experimentation.\n- Bonus: Knowledge of audio editing, sound design, or motion graphics.\n\n04: How to Apply\nPlease submit:\n-Your resume.\n- A short cover letter explaining your experience with AI video generation.\n- Links to 2-3 vertical video samples or AI-driven projects.",

            display: inline-block;
            font-size: var(--font-size-base-xs);
            padding: 8px;
            padding: var(--spacing-2x);
            position: relative

        .text-vertical-separator:after,
        .text-vertical-separator:before {
            border-right: 1px solid;
            content: "";
            height: 8px;
            height: var(--spacing-2x);
            left: 50%;
            position: absolute
        }
        
        .text-vertical-separator:before {
            top: 0
        }
        
        .text-vertical-separator:after {
            bottom: 0
        }

        }

        }

        }

            margin-bottom: var(--list-margin);
            margin-top: 0;
            padding-left: var(--list-padding)
        }
        
        ol ol,
        ol ul,
        ul ol,
        ul ul {
            margin-bottom: 0
        }
        
        ol li,
        ul li {
            margin-bottom: var(--list-margin)
        }

            padding-left: 16px;
            padding-left: var(--spacing-4x)
        }

        }

        }

            list-style: none;

            margin-left: -4px;

        }

            display: inline-block;
            padding-left: 4px;

        }

        }

        }

        }

        }

        }

            bottom: -.25em
        }

            top: -.5em
        }
        
        .query-container {
            container-type: inline-size
        }
        
        .layout-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            min-height: 100%
        }
        
        .layout {
            flex: 1 0 auto
        }
        
        .layout>.container,
        .layout>.container-visitor,
        .layout>main>.container,
        .layout>main>.container-visitor {
            padding-bottom: var(--container-ws-y);
            padding-top: var(--container-ws-y)
        }
        
        .container,
        .container-visitor {
            --container-width: 1280px;
            --container-ws-x: var(--spacing-container-x);
            --container-ws-y: var(--spacing-container-y);
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
            padding-left: var(--container-ws-x)!important;
            padding-right: var(--container-ws-x)!important;
            position: relative;
            width: min(100%, calc(1280px + var(--spacing-container-x)*2));
            width: min(100%, calc(var(--container-width) + var(--container-ws-x)*2))
        }
        
        .layout-sidebar_enabled {
            --layout-sidebar-function: cubic-bezier(0, 1.4, 0.6, 1);
            --layout-sidebar-duration: 0.6s;
            --layout-sidebar-zindex: calc(var(--zindex-fullscreen) + 1);
            --fullscreen-offset: var(--layout-sidebar-width)
        }
        
        @media (min-width:700px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled {
                --layout-sidebar-duration: 0.3s
            }
        }
        
        .layout-sidebar_enabled .layout-sidebar_page-content {
            width: 100%;
            width: var(--layout-content-width, 100%)
        }
        
        .layout-sidebar_enabled .layout-sidebar_sidebar {
            bottom: 0;
            height: 100%;
            position: fixed;
            right: 0;
            transition: var( --reduced-motion, all var(--layout-sidebar-duration) var(--layout-sidebar-function));
            width: 0;
            width: var(--layout-sidebar-width, 0);
            z-index: var(--layout-sidebar-zindex)
        }
        
        @media (max-width:699.98px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled .layout-sidebar_sidebar {
                height: 0;
                width: 100%
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width:700px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded {
                --layout-content-width: 50%;
                --layout-sidebar-width: 50%
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width:992px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded {
                --layout-content-width: 60%;
                --layout-sidebar-width: 40%
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width:1200px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded {
                --layout-content-width: 66.666%;
                --layout-sidebar-width: 33.333%
            }
        }
        
        @media (max-width:699.98px) {
            .layout-sidebar_enabled.layout-sidebar_expanded .layout-sidebar_sidebar {
                height: 100%
            }
        }
        
        @media (max-width:699.98px) {
            html:where(:not(.has-cq)) .up-smf {
                margin-top: calc(var(--ws-4x)*-1)
            }
        }
        
        @container (max-width: 699.98px) {
            html:where(.has-cq) .up-smf {
                margin-top: calc(var(--ws-4x)*-1)
            }
        }
        
        .up-smf-very-top .up-alert {
            margin-left: 0;
            margin-right: 0
        }
        
        #__layout,
        #__nuxt {
            height: 100%
        }
        
        :root {
            --nc-user-nav-height: var(--ma-u-nav-height, 64px)
        }
        
        @media (max-width:991.98px) {
            :root {

            }
        }

        }

                                    .ma-scope_user#user-top-navigation-container {
                                        --nav-height: var(--ma-u-nav-height);
                                        contain: layout
                                    }
                                    
                                    #user-top-navigation-container.ma-scope_user.nav-fix-position {
                                        position: absolute;
                                        width: 100%;
                                        z-index: var(--zindex-navbar)
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 {
                                        height: var(--nav-height);
                                        min-height: auto!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 {
                                        --nav-toggle: flex;
                                        margin-bottom: var(--nav-margin);
                                        background: var(--nav-bg);
                                        color: var(--nav-text);
                                        box-shadow: var(--nav-shadow);
                                        letter-spacing: var(--nav-letter-spacing)
                                    }
                                    
                                    @media (forced-colors:active) {
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 {
                                            border-bottom: var(--border-hc)
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .up-skip-nav {
                                        padding: 14px var(--nav-ws-4x);
                                        font-size: calc(var(--font-size-base) + 1px);
                                        background: var(--nav-bg);
                                        color: var(--nav-text-accent);
                                        z-index: calc(var(--zindex-navbar-fixed) + 1)
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .up-skip-nav:focus {
                                        width: auto;
                                        height: auto;
                                        clip: auto;
                                        clip-path: none;
                                        outline-offset: -2px
                                    }
                                    
                                    @media print {
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .up-skip-nav {
                                            display: none
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-flex {
                                        display: flex!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-none {
                                        display: none!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-block {
                                        display: block!important
                                    }
                                    
                                    @container (min-width: 992px) {
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-lg-none {
                                            display: none!important
                                        }
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-lg-block {
                                            display: block!important
                                        }
                                        .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-d-lg-flex {
                                            display: flex!important
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .flex-1 {
                                        flex: 1
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .align-items-center {
                                        align-items: center
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 .nav-container {
                                        position: relative;
                                        margin-left: auto;
                                        margin-right: auto;
                                        width: min(var(--nav-container-width), var(--nav-container-max-width));
                                        padding-right: var(--nav-container-padding);
                                        padding-left: var(--nav-container-padding);
                                        background: var(--nav-bg)
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2,
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 button,
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 input {
                                        font-family: var(--font-family-base), "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                                        font-size: var(--nav-font-size)
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 input::-moz-placeholder {
                                        opacity: 1
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 :where(ul, li, button:not(.air3-btn)) {
                                        padding: 0;
                                        margin: 0
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 button:not(.air3-btn, .up-skip-nav, .nav-btn-status, .nav-search-switch-btn, .air3-token-btn, .nav-switch-btn) {
                                        background: #0000;
                                        border: 0;
                                        cursor: pointer
                                    }
                                    
                                    .ma-scope_user .nav-v2 ul {
                                        list-style: none
                                    }

Time: </span> <span data-test="duration">1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week</span></span></span></small> <small class="mt-3x d-flex align-items-center text-light text-base-sm"><div class="mr-2x air3-icon sm"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" aria-hidden="true" viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img"><path vector-effect="non-scaling-stroke" stroke="var(--icon-color, #001e00)" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="1.5" d="M12 11.9a2.5 2.5 0 100-5 2.5 2.5 0 000 5z"></path><path vector-effect="non-scaling-stroke" stroke="var(--icon-color, #001e00)" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="1.5" d="M18.4 9.4C18.4 5.9 15.6 3 12 3 8.4 3 5.6 5.9 5.6 9.4c0 1.5.6 2.9 1.5 4.1 1.3 1.8 5 7.5 5 7.5s3.6-5.7 5-7.5c.7-1.2 1.3-2.5 1.3-4.1z"></path></svg></div> <!----> <span data-test="location-requirement">

                                                        <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" data-test="job-description-line-clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper text-body break job-description" style="--lines:3;--line-clamp-expanded-height:nullpx;">
                                                            <!---->
                                                            <div id="air3-line-clamp-154804" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><span data-test="job-description-text">Were producing a broadcast television series focused on science, health, and longevity  and were looking for a talented AI-native video editor and motion graphics creator to join our post-production team on a freelance basis.

This role is ideal for someone whos fluent in generative video tools and can quickly produce visual segments that enhance storytelling. Youll be responsible for using AI platforms to generate explainers, motion graphics, and custom visuals that will be included directly in final cuts for broadcast.

Key Responsibilities:
		Use generative tools (Runway, Pika, Genmo, ElevenLabs, etc.) to create visuals, motion graphics, or B-roll elements
		Generate photos and art that can be then broken down into Photoshop layers to be animated. 
- take descriptoins from the show and create full AI sequences based on the visuals described
		Collaborate with editors and producers to integrate content seamlessly into episodes
		Engineer prompts and refine outputs for quality and consistency
		Prepare versioned or localized outputs as needed



Ideal Candidate:
		Strong portfolio or reel with examples of generative video or motion design
		Comfortable with tools like Runway, Pika, Genmo, Sora, Stable Diffusion, etc.
		Experience with editing tools like Premiere Pro, Resolve, or Final Cut
		Understands narrative pacing, polish, and tone appropriate for TV
		Self-starter who can take a brief and run with it  but also collaborate with a team



Project Details:
		Type: Freelance (Ongoing, episodic support)
		Location: Remote
		Start Date: ASAP
		Rate: $400$600/day (or per segment, negotiable based on scope & experience)
		Duration: Project-based with potential for longer-term collaboration



To apply, please submit:
	1.	A short message describing your experience with generative video tools
	2.	A portfolio or reel showcasing relevant work
	3.	Your availability and preferred rate structure

Were excited to work with someone whos passionate about the future of video and ready to help push the boundaries of storytelling with AI.</span></div>

                            ciphertext: "~021950982334434359476",
                            description: "01: About Us\nWe are a forward-thinking media production company, blending cutting-edge AI\ntools with traditional video storytelling. Were looking for someone who is a\nskilled video editor as well as a creative AI Generation Specialist. The ideal\ncandidate thrives at the intersection of technology and visual storytelling for\nvertical narrative production.\n\n02: What Youll Do\nAI Video Generation:\n       - Utilize the latest AI-generation tools to produce high-quality content.\n       - Develop custom AI-generated elements  including scene enhancements, transitions, and visual effects  to elevate storytelling.\n       - Experiment with new AI video tools and workflows to keep our production\ncutting-edge.\n\nVideo Editing:\n        - Edit and deliver polished vertical-format (9:16) videos\n       - Combine AI-generated visuals with traditional footage for cohesive narratives.\n       - Ensure all videos meet brand aesthetics and technical quality standards.\n\nOptimization and Collaboration:\n       - Tailor edits for mobile-first audiences, ensuring maximum engagement.\n       - Maintain organized project files, versioning, and deliverables\n       - Collaborate with our production team and editors to conceptualize unique and\nengaging AI-driven video\n\n03: What Were Looking For\n- Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio\n       - Short-form, vertical content preferred\n- Expertise in AI video generation tools, such as:\n       - Runway Gen-2\u002F3\n       - Pika Labs\n       - Google Veo (Flow)\n       - Luma Labs\n       - MidJourney or other image-to-video workflows.\n       - Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro.\n- Strong understanding of 9:16 composition and mobile-first content strategies.\n- A passion for storytelling, AI technology, and creative experimentation.\n- Bonus: Knowledge of audio editing, sound design, or motion graphics.\n\n04: How to Apply\nPlease submit:\n-Your resume.\n- A short cover letter explaining your experience with AI video generation.\n- Links to 2-3 vertical video samples or AI-driven projects.",
